reviews.customers_say: Customers find this dress to be of good quality, comfortable, and flattering, with one mentioning it accentuates curves effectively. The dress features nice thick material that keeps customers warm, and they appreciate its adjustable length with drawstrings on the sides. While some it's not see-through, others find it completely see-through.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Styles and fit great!
items.body: Material was nice and stretchy, but soft and durable. Color pictured is black, the design was stylish and flattering. Comfortable to wear and can be dressed up or down. Read more
items.author: Dexter

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Must have for fall
items.body: Love this dress. Very comfortable & is very flattering. Read more
items.author: Quanda S Wright

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Flattering, great price, looks like it looks in the pictures
items.body: I had a wedding to go to and I don't really get dressed up often, so I don't have many dresses. My boss actually recommended Amazon...this was a fall wedding and I wanted something black. I ordered a few dresses because the prices were really good. It's hard ordering online because you don't know what you're gonna get. The other 2 dresses weren't anything like I thought they were gonna be. I tried this one on last and I really loved it. It's flattering and shows off your curves, it's stretchy so it fits all body types. I don't particularly like looking at myself in the mirror but I really liked this one. It's so simple and so comfortable (comfort is important to me lol) it's not too thick, not too thin and most importantly, not itchy. Also, nice quality material, doesn't feel cheap (like the other two dresses I tried). You can adjust the length (it is short, it does ride up sometimes, but it wasn't really an issue) I added a silver belt I had from another dress I had just to dress it up. Its perfect for a fall/winter event (naturally, the day was unusually warm, but we were inside most of the time). Great price too. Thanks for saving me the anxiety of going out and looking for something I would probably pay too much for and never wear again. I love this dress. Read more
items.author: Stephanie

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars CUTE BUT CLOSE TO THE NECK
items.body: Wore this for my birthday dinner earlier this month and it was super cute! But, it was kind of tight around the neck area, would’ve preferred it to be lower on that part but everything else was great & the length as well! Read more
items.author: Angie

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sexy dress
items.body: I love this sweater dress, and it is very cute and sexy in person. I’m 5’6 38DD and 214 pounds and I carry most of my weight in my bottom and thighs. The dress goes a little bit lower than my bottom, so I wear tights with it but all in all I love it. I did order size XL and I’m usually a size large and it fits snug. Read more
items.author: Azia

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Super cute!
items.body: Super cute. My daughter typically wears a medium but the small fit her much better! Good quality. Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Flattering dress
items.body: I love this dress! It’s super comfortable and very flattering! I love fact that the length is adjustable and the fabric is thick enough to not be sheer but not too hot. I wanted my dress to be more form fitting so I sized down because of the stretchyness of the fabric. Overall good dress for the price! Read more
items.author: Brittney Cudworth

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars It’s quality and so comfortable
items.body: Just do it! Buy this dress.! …it’s so so comfortable. And unlike most things off here, it’s seemingly good quality. I’m 5’5 200lbs and and Xl. They were out of stock for xl and I think I got a 1x or 2x. Still fit great and I think it was a good thing because it was very much still body con but not over stretched on my body so not see through. And unlike some other body con sweater dresses I tried, it didn’t ride up too much but I think my sleek feeling body shaper I wore probably helped with that. I loved the adjustable drawstrings on the side but did cut them shorter because the length was obnoxious. Read more
items.author: Grace

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve Bodycon Ruched is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.
about_this_item:

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve Bodycon Ruched is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Pink1, Blue, Dark Green1, Grey Blue, White1, Army Green, Dark Purple-1, Light Purple, Orange1, Beige1, Black1, Coffee1. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
